original_text: So Haman replied to the king, ‘This is what you should do for that man, if you want to give him honour.
korean_text: 왕께 아뢰되 왕께서 사람을 존귀하게 하시려면

sentences.original_text: So Haman replied to the king
This is what you should do for that man
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람을 위해 당신이 해야 할 일이 이것입니다
